verses.text: Ix yalanxi Jehová t'a winhaj Moisés chi' icha tik:
Al t'a winhaj Aarón yet' t'a heb' yuninal yet' t'a masanil heb' etchonhab' to in checnab'il juntzanhxo tik:
Yalnhej mach smilancham junok nok' wacax, junok nok' calnel, ma junok nok' chiwa silab'oc t'a spatiquel campamento, ma t'a yool,
palta max yik'cotlaj nok' t'a stielxo in cajnub' b'aj tzin ch'ox in b'a, yowalil manhxa yalan yic t'a he kal. Ha jun chi' scotcan t'a yib'anh, yujto tonhej stob'canem schiq'uil nok' ta'.

Icha chi' tz'aj walani yic mantzac he comon milej nok' nok' silab'il t'a spatiquel campamento, palta to tzeyik'cot nok' t'a stiel in cajnub', haxo junok winh sacerdote tz'ak'anoch nok' silab'il yic junk'olal t'a wichanh.
Ha winh sacerdote chi' stzicanoch schiq'uil nok' t'a spatictac altar t'a wichanh, aton t'a stielxo in cajnub', snhustz'a xepual nok' winh t'a wichanh, suk'uq'ui sjab' swab'i.
Manhxa b'ak'uinh tzeyak' junokxo silab' t'a heb' enemigo, aton juntzanh b'aj ochnac ex ejmelal. Yujnhej juntzanh chi' ex juwiel t'a wichanh. Ha jun tik ley tz'ajkan t'a he kal t'a masanil tiempo.
Yalnhej mach heb' eyetisraelal, ma ch'oc chonhab'il cajanek' t'a he kal, tato syak' junok silab' stz'ai, ma yalnhej tas silab'il,
palta to max yik'cotlaj t'a stielxo in cajnub' b'aj tzin ch'ox in b'a yic tz'ak'ji t'ayin, a jun anima chi', manhxa yalan yic t'a he kal.
Te ay wal yowal in k'ol t'a yalnhej mach eyetisraelal ma junok ch'oc chonhab'il ayek' t'a he kal schi'an schiq'uil nok' nok'. Ha in wal ol in och ajk'olal t'ay, ol in satanel t'a he kal.

Yujto masanil nok' nok' yet' anima, a yuj schiq'uil pitzan, yuj chi' ix wala' to stob'jioch schiq'uil nok' t'a spatictac altar yic slajwicanel mul. Yujto ha t'a schiq'uil nok' chi' ay sk'inal yuj chi' syal yak'an tup mul chi'.
Yuj chi' swal t'ayex israel ex tik to malaj junok ex, ma heb' ch'oc chonhab'il ayek' cajan t'a he kal syal chi'an schiq'uil nok' nok'.
Yalnhej mach ex ma heb' ch'oc chonhab'il ayek' cajan t'a he kal syamchaj junok nok' nok' yuj, ma junok nok' much, aton nok' toxonton schiji, yowalil syik'canel schiq'uil nok', smucancan yet' lum lum.
Yujto a chik' chi' ik'an pitzan nok', yuj chi' swal t'ayex to max yal-laj schiji nok' chib'ej aytooch schiq'uil. Yalnhej mach schi'ani, satjiel t'a he kal.

Yalnhej mach ex, ma ch'oc chonhab'il schi'an nok' chib'ej to tonhej schami, mato smiljicham yuj junok nok' chium nok', yowalil sjuk'el spichul, sb'icanel sb'a, palta manh wach'oc tz'ajcani masanto sq'uik'b'iemi.
Palta tato max sjuk'el spichul, mato max sb'iquel sb'a, scannhej smul chi' t'a yib'anh, xa chi, xchi Jehová t'a winhaj Moisés chi'.
